wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Albert Beney (21 February 1887 – 20 April 1915) was an English professional football forward who played in the Football League for Woolwich Arsenal and Bury.

response: *Transfer fee received: £250 from Arsenal for Bert Beney, February 1909.
*Most goals in a season: Bert Beney, 60 (1907–08)
